briefTitle: ABCSG 8 - Adjuvant Treatment in Patients With Hormone Receptor-positive Breast Cancer With Good to Moderate Differentiation.
officialTitle: Adjuvant Endocrine Therapy in Postmenopausal Patients With HR +ve BC With Good to Moderate Differentiation - ARNO (Arimidex + Nolvadex). Primary Treatment for 2 Years With Tamoxifen Thereafter Randomisation to: Tamoxifen 3 Years or Anastrozole 3 Years.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To assess the difference in event free survival and overall survival (subject to stand-alone or combined/meta-analysis) between postmenopausal women with HR +ve early BC who switched from tamoxifen to anastrozole and those who continued on tamoxifen.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Invasive mammary carcinoma after radical treatment, without prior chemo/hormone/radiation therapy.
* At least 6 lymph nodes examined.
* Good or intermediate tumour differentiation.
* \<6 weeks before start of adjuvant therapy.
* Oestrogen or Progesterone positive

Exclusion Criteria:

* Premenopausal.
* Preoperative hormonal/antihormonal/radiation/cytoxic chemo. Second malignant tumour/status post second malignant tumour.
* In-situ/T4 carcinoma.
* Age \>80 years.
* World Health Organisation performance index \>3.
* Serious accompanying diseases
